replies.body:
The Elder Dragon change is, frankly, unbelievably stupid. The game doesn't need an execute like that, it's obscene.

Why add *more* lethality items? Don't assassins already dominate enough?
I know flashy plays are all that matter, not skill, not planning, but at least *try* not to further alienate anyone who isn't a tank and/or assassin.

You've also officially killed off half the supports in the game too with this patch.
We won't have an ADC/support lane any more, we will end up with disgusting duo lanes between champions who were never meant to lane together.

Also, the new Thresh skins are terrible.
They don't look like Pulsefire skins, they look like a beta version of a Program skin.
As a support main I hate this. It is hard enough to climb ranked as it is as a support when your team is useless. This patch just discourages players to play support even more.
How does the anti-poaching system work if my ADC leaves, is AFK, or is just rubbish? My team goes 4v5 and I can't farm up to try and get back into the game? Rubbish

Wow.  As a passive support main, this patch is awful.  Riot officially hates the way I play the game and will crush my dreams at every opportunity.  Having Banner Of Command removed a while back was insulting.  Seeing Zzrot and Ancient Coin go now as well is truly pathetic and exactly what I feared would happen.  I guess it's all about flashy champs with super-mobility now.  Riot, just say that you don't want a true supportive playstyle in the game at all and go.
Seems like it is a MASSIVE support nerf and that they are less relevant, especially as a support mage. Also, welcome to the meta where its assassins only lol
I feel gutted as a support mage with the new spellthief just ruined my play style. Late game. I feel like I do nothing. Unless take a kill or 2 from my adc I have no gold, or away to stay current
Feels. I just tried a few games as Sona/Lulu/Nami and it is just the worst.
Too hard to support anymore! Too many hidden places for ambush and not totally fucked up the game play.

don't like the removal of the cooldown for the relic shield or the support changes in general particularly the removal of the spoils of war passive once you have a  1000 gold hard enough to get gold on support without docking us cs as well

I mean if you wanted to create a high-mobility unforgiving game with no room for unique play styles then congrats Riot you succeeded admirably. Soraka and Nami were in my top three most played champions, and with these changes I'm not sure how I'm supposed to fit them into the new meta. Feels like everyone who isn't an early game killing machine is getting punished in this meta. Why were all of these changes necessary? Also as a side note, both the Thresh and the Aatrox skin look horrible in my opinion.
i fken hate the new elder dragon. Legit no need pyke's ult, and the tank will be legit useless. Feeling just went back to s2, s3, s4 one drag can change the whole game.
Legit looking at these changes as a support main, I'm better of just taking dorans ring. You always have to ruin support at preseason. Im so close to uninstalling riot, seriously.
Except you will get taxed for taking CS unde rhte anti-poaching thing. So without a gold item you are dead in the water. Unless I'm reading this wrong
So what, the support item loses its gold share/minion execute after its upgraded anyway.
ADC hit their lowest in S9, now with the JG priority and Bot lane exp reduce, ADCs are going to be out of roaster in S10
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
how did the new elder dragon make it to live

The experience changes are so unnecessary and completely fuck the game.
Jungle is ruined. Never tried so hard and been so useless.

Fixed a bug where ADC can sometimes produce damage in teamfight.

New patch: One shot by Assassins
Holy they finally fixed the oddly specific camera bug that affected me every game! Oh, and there's some other cool stuff.

A mixed support main, Leona, Sona, Naut, Nami, Lulu and Alistar. This patch is absolutely horrible, once the tank support items are upgraded you lose the minion execute? Its hard enough to get gold as a support, now its worse. The AP item for supports offers nothing in the way of kits, it synergies with absolutely nothing and once again, you lose the gold on hit after the item is fully upgraded. 

The elder dragon is horrendous. A 20% health execute? Once its taken, there is no outplay potential, there is fight, then blow up before you can make an escape or play. 

Everybody here seems to agree, and not just agree but be completely overwhelmed by the stupidity of this entire patch. When are you going to listen to players?

With the new areas that supp now have to ward, can you please implement that champions can have 2 control wards on the map at once? Also when you purchase a control ward, can it go into the ward slot, like rift herald does, so that late game when there’s no item slots available we can still purchase control wards to keep up with the extra terrain. Also maybe make control wards cost less for supp champs as we are way behind in gold as is.

Would be cool if Twisted Treeline can still be a custom, many people love it. There are dozens of us, literally dozens.

 {{sticker:sg-shisa}}

REALLY disliking this elderdragon execute, way too powerful. "Dodging" it does nothing, the only way i see dodging this is with zhonyas, and after you come out of stasis guess what? auto attack and you are exe'd anyway. I don't think we needed an execute, you are effectively removing 20% of the opposing team's hp, does not feel good at all. please remove

On this same note, it feels like dragon souls do nothing compared to elder buff
What happened to Victorious Aatrox for Gold TFT players? My profile said I was getting it and now i'm not? #feelsbadman
you were never getting it. TFT and normal ranked were getting different prizes from the start. ranked tft gets an emote, thats it.

Seriously what's with the constant removal/nerfing of mana regen? Running out of mana is the most frustrating thing! that and getting 1 shot as soon as your seen, which seems to be another goal of patches lately... RIP support

Hey, just wanted to suggest fixing how powerful stormrazor is at the moment and how expensive zeal is. I'm a jinx main so I usually buy 3 zeal items in my build as standard, but now instead of buying the items optimal for my abilities I've found it's actually advantages to buy stormrazor instead for it's base stats namely damage.

Hi Riot,
Please fix the Katarina bug which is as follows:

auto attack an enemy unit,
shunpo to different enemy unit that is within shunpo range of where you are auto attacking from, then katarina, instead of auto attacking the unit you shunpo'd to, she will walk to the previously targeted enemy unit to auto attack it.

cost many if not all katarina players kills and lanes because of it.

not expecting any riot dev to read this or get a respone but is there any chance tristana can have some of her ult cd nerf refunded, it was a massive nerf to ap tristana which relies on it for damage and presence of mind was a huge help in lowering it down but now its gone.
These elemental updates are really cool, however, the way the screen brightness changes are just awful and distracting.
Wont Presence of mind be Op for akali?
I think it would be strong on all assassins and I think it would be better late game than triumph so personally I'm pretty happy about that change.

Give
Us
More
Maps
Not
Less

I really don't think so called 'passive support' should be normalized, a passive support like {{champion:267}}  or {{champion:16}}  always ruin the game, you probably don't realize that by selecting your healing drones, other lanes have to pick tanks and control otherwise you lose for sure, the correct direction of support is to only allow champions with HARD CC
